name: Shanmukha Priya
description: '''Shanmukha Priya''' (born 2 November 2002) is an Indian singer, who specializes in the [[carnatic music]], [[jazz]], rock, pop and [[yodeling]]. She has appeared on numerous popular reality television shows, including [[Padutha Theeyaga|''Padutha Theeyaga S6'']] (2013), ''[[Sa Re Ga Ma Pa L'il Champs 2017]]'' (2017) and [[Indian Idol|''Indian Idol 12'']] (2020â€“21).
